text:
BREAKING:

Democrats just launched ANOTHER investigation into Donald Trump

This time for the legal firing of a partisan, Obama-appointed Inspector General

36 Million Americans out of work

Suicide rates are up

And all Democrats care about is investigating Trump

Disgraceful.
